articles.title: Blowout Reddit debut raises hopes of revival in dormant IPO market - Financial Times
articles.description: Other companies could be emboldened by the social media group’s successful listing, say bankers
articles.content:
A string of companies could follow Reddit into the US stock market in the coming months, bankers believe, after shares of the social media group leapt 48 per cent on their debut.
